description:
Discover the best way to learn the German Highway Code! Prepare for the exam, test your knowledge, and challenge your friends in exclusive mini games. Enjoy every mode in solo or with other players, overcome your blind spots with special quiz series. Your future driving license is right around the corner!

• Up to 4 players on the same screen: challenge your friends and family on their road safety skills!
• Exclusive minigames: aim for the highest score in Survival Mode! 
• More than 1100 questions/answers fully voiced in German, covering every official topic and more. Complete lessons and levels from easiest to hardest difficulty, to be prepared for every situation.
• Custom experience: monitor your progress with the individual player profile. Discover your complete results, work on your weak points and unlock trophies as you improve!
• Full compliance with the new German Highway Code, featuring an Exam Mode recreating the exact conditions of the real exam. All content comes from the official StVO.
name: Bestanden! Dein Weg zum Führerschein
